title: Cinefantastique Vol 02 No 1 (Spring 1972)
creator: Cinefantastique
description: Includes the second part of The History and Technique of Fantasy Film Animation, interviews with Paul Wendkos (The Mephisto Waltz) and Alan Gadney (Moon Child), a visit to the set of Dracula A.D. 1972, a preview of Flesh Gordon, and reviews of The Brotherhood of Satan, The Clowns, The Devils, The Gladiators, Horror of the Blood Monsters, Lust for a Vampire, Next!, The Night Digger, Night of Dark Shadows, The Omega Man, Peter Rabbit and Tales of Beatrix Potter, The Reincarnate, The Return of Count Yorga, Unman Wittering and Zigo, Deep End, Willard, Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory, and more.
